trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Pompano Beach
There was one other sighting in Pompano Beach on or around March 17th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving throygh my neighborhood, and noticed the light hovering . I stopped my veicle, took out my phone camera and was able to take two pictures cosecutively, and it begun to descend, as i tried to change over to video I hardly had anytime before I lost it in the treetops. looked like it was over the ocean. i was about five miles from the ocean. there were several airplanes in the area. it moved too fast and was too bright to be either a plane or a blimp
Summary: extremely bright blue/violet glowing light, with hints of red was stationary, hovered for a few seconds the descended in a straight path down fairly quikly
